Key Match Events: Reece Topley took 3 wickets for 88 runs
Adil Rashid took 2 wickets for 61 runs
Gerald Coetzee took 3 wickets for 35 runs
Lungi Ngidi took 2 wickets for 26 runs
England's chase was short of the target
Pre-Game Insights: Aiden Markram, South Africa captain, said they couldn't have asked for a bigger effort and skills to top it off
Jos Buttler, England captain, said it was incredibly disappointing and changes weren't as big an issue
Heinrich Klaasen said the conditions were brutal and he was told not to run his runs too hard to save energy
Aakash mentioned the points table now looks to have the correct top 4: NZ, India, South Africa, and Australia
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler expressed disappointment and said the loss leaves with no room for error
Heinrich Klaasen said it was up there with his best ever performance and that the conditions were brutal
Aiden Markram praised the team's performance and the skills they showcased
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 22 overs for England
The match was played at Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai
England elected to field first after winning the toss
